name: spiciness
content:
spiciness noun [U]
(FOOD)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of containing strong flavours from spices, or the degree to which something has this quality: I like the spiciness of Indian food. You can specify the preferred level of spiciness.
More examplesFewer examplesSichuan cooking is known for its spiciness.To even out the spiciness of an Indian meal, eat something sweet.Enormous banquets with the spiciness adjusted to your taste are available.

spiciness noun [U]
(EXCITEMENT)
the quality of being exciting and interesting, especially because of being shocking or dealing with sexual matters: De Benedet brings a feisty, seductive spiciness to the role. The dialogue in "Tender is the Night" does not have the comic spiciness or color of that in "The Great Gatsby".
More examplesFewer examplesOne can't overlook the spiciness of the news.The music has a harmonic spiciness quite unlike that of baroque music.
